prod_long_desc:
The LEGO® Friends Amusement Park Space Ride comes with articulated arms and hologram stickers to create great speed effects. As you spin the ride faster, the arms lift the rockets higher into the air. There's also a photo booth with movable camera to catch the action, and an ice cream stand to cool down after the ride. Includes an Olivia mini-doll figure.
Includes an Olivia mini-doll figure in a summer outfit.
Features a spinning Space Ride with 3 rocket seats on 3 articulated arms, which lift higher as the ride turns faster.
Also features a photo booth with moveable camera and display board selling pictures taken during the ride, plus an ice cream stand.
Accessory elements include a photo, bill, 2 ice creams and a popsicle.
See how fast you can spin the ride, and how high the articulated arms will lift the rockets.
Take pictures of the customers enjoying the funfair and sell them at the booth.
Open the freezer of the ice cream stand and choose a scoop to treat yourself after the ride.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 6-12.
Amusement Park Space Ride with arms extended measures over 5” high, 7” wide and 7” long.
Photo booth measures over 3” high, 2” wide and under 1” long.
Ice cream stand measures over 1” wide, and under 1” high and 1” long.
Combine with the 41127 Amusement Park Arcade, 41129 Amusement Park Hot Dog Van and 41130 Amusement Park Roller Coaster to create the Heartlake Amusement Park.
